title: Insilico’s AI obesity drug hits up to 31.3% weight loss
summary: Preclinical results spotlight a new AI-driven approach to obesity, one tied less to appetite alone and more to long-term metabolic health. It is hard to miss how fast obesity drugs have moved from specialist clinics to dinner-table conversations, especially this year, when more and more weight-loss drugs are going mainstream. GLP-1 therapies reshaped expectations almost […] The post Insilico’s AI obesity drug hits up to 31.3% weight loss appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Kyle Umipig
